name: Forest Flare
description:
Forest Flare is a adventure and puzzle game about an illusionist that explores a magical forest. You have to find special flowers to deal with different illusion that the woods put in your way. Can you make your way through the puzzles?

Keybinding: 1-5 selects unlocked powerds and a fire gem, with a collected fire gem selected (5) and pressing E on a highlighted vines object you can destroy them, keep an eye out for flowers! if they are highlighted while you are near them you can collect it with E, you can crouch with ctrl, sprint is with shift

The Team:

Felix Hänsel, Mercal Sturm, Jasmin Xu, Michael Geiger
